Sr. Front-End/Angular Developer:
About Us:
Clearbridge Mobile, an Amdocs company, is an award-winning mobile app developer that designs and develops best-in-class mobile solutions for clients including PayPal, Tim Hortons, Rogers, Bell, TD Bank, and USA Today. We are growing quickly and searching for smart, passionate people who want to join us in our mission to drive mobile transformation for the world’s most forward-thinking companies.

Job Responsibilities:
Frontend development using Angular 9+, HTML, CSS, SASS/SCSS, TypeScript, JavaScript, Ngrx, Rxjs, Bootstrap, Ajax methods
Working in a small team with a startup mentality, writing high quality reusable code
Comfortable recommending technical solutions to a development and business audience.
Collaborating with other development teams to support business on day to day development requests
Innovating and testing out new solutions through POCs and iterative releases
Interpreting business requirements into technical solutions
Preparing documentation and use case scenarios

Requirements:
A university degree in computer science or equivalent education
Proficient in HTML5, TypeScript, CSS, SASS/SCSS, Bootstrap
5+ years of experience with Angular framework,Ngrx, Rxjs, RESTful Web Services and experience with API integration
Experience with Akamai NetStorage, Accessibility - WCAG 2.0+ , Adobe Analytics
Write the unit testing
Experience with cross browser compatibility
Flexible and adaptive, team player
Excellent analytical communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work well under pressure, prioritize work and well organized
Ability to take ownership on the deliverables
Comfortable working with market driven timelines

What We Offer:
Clearbridge Mobile is focused on investing in our employees and company culture. We have worked hard to develop a collaborative and team-oriented environment that fosters opportunities for professional development. Our perks and benefits include:
Career and skill development opportunities
Exposure to a diverse range of projects and industries
Opportunities to contribute to the global technology community

Currently, all team members are working on a hybrid model.

Clearbridge Mobile welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

We thank all applicants for their interest; only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.
